name: Spectacular
shortDescription:
Spectacular Angular integration testing. Spectacular's specialized test harnesses enable integration testing of Angulars-specific classes.

Try feature testing by combining Spectacular with Angular Testing Library or Angular Component Harnesses. Test as a user and scope your test to an entire routed feature module.
longDescription:
Spectacular Angular integration testing. Spectacular's specialized test harnesses enable integration testing of Angulars-specific classes.

Try feature testing by combining Spectacular with Angular Testing Library or Angular Component Harnesses. Test as a user and scope your test to an entire routed feature module.
